adjective.description: Specifically. Of language, a word, etc.: incorrect, wrongly used. Formerly also: †figurative, not literal (obsolete). Now rare.
Not appropriate for particular circumstances; not in accordance with accepted standards; inappropriate, unsuitable, unacceptable.
Specifically. Not in accordance with good manners or decorum; indecent, immodest.

origin: Late Middle English (in an earlier sense). From un- + proper.
